skmsg: Fix wrong last sg check in sk_msg_recvmsg()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.8 by commit 10ee118a1756141f8e9c87aa7344ed12b41630a8, it was introduced in version v5.19.2 by commit 1295dae30f30c3daa03005ed8958d44b17f037fd. For more details please see the references link.
